title: Mobile Application Security Analyst
body:
Company Description

SGS Digital Trust Services provides Cybersecurity research, testing and certification services. Working in partnership with Graz University of Technology (TU Graz) at the Cybersecurity Campus Graz, we operate one of the world's largest Cyber security evaluation labs where security experts focus on testing and certification of digital products, networked systems and online services.


Job Description

Working as a member of our Secure Products and Systems Team, you will assess the compliance and security of mobile applications according to various standards and certifications.

You will:

  • Analyse mobile applications, devices and products under test conditions;
  • Develop fault plans;
  • Qualitative and quantitative results analysis;
  • Develop new tools and products for future projects.

Qualifications
  • Educated to Degree, Masters or PhD in Information Technology, Informatics, Electrical and Electronic Engineering, Computer Science Mathematics or a related subject;
  • Qualitative and quantitative analytical skills;
  • Good knowledge of Android and iOS smartphone technology;
  • Knowledge of mobile application design;
  • Test automation experience;
  • Good understanding of mobile security (e.g. OWASP Mobile Top 10);
  • Good coding skills and familiarity with coding languages;
  • Debugging techniques;
  • Reverse Engineering knowledge.

Additional Information

This position will be based in our Cyber Lab at the Cybersecurity Campus Graz,

You must be an EU or NATO citizen to be eligible for employment at the Cybersecurity Campus Graz.
